pages.text: Ye have to fight off the goblins before they kill us all.
They took up residence in the caves to the north. Ye must fight with anything you can.

You're alive? And after all this time. We haven't seen another Old God here since your brother. No matter - the war is over, and we haven't been properly introduced. My name is Serifex, and I bring fresh water to the Bodnam. Your kind have been gone for a long time, after all, and there's a new order to things.

links.text: My brother? What has happened to Nemesis?

pages.text: My name is Loruch, God of the trees. We never fought, but I know who you are. No matter, the world is different now. We Gods live in peace with the natural forces of the multiverse, guiding the Bodnam from afar.
